quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: To overcome fear, here's all you have to do: realize the fear is there, and do the action you fear anyway.
author: Peter McWilliams

quote: Real courage is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. Doing the unpopular thing because it's what you believe.
author: Ben Sasse

quote: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: It takes courage to open our hearts and expose our true selves to the world.
author: Unknown

quote: You can’t be brave if you’ve only had wonderful things happen to you.
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Sometimes courage is the little voice at the end of the day that says I’ll try again tomorrow.
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Stand up straight and realize who you are, that you tower over your circumstances.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Without fear there cannot be courage.
author: Christopher Paolini

quote: Each time we face our fear, we gain strength, courage, and confidence in the doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Do the thing you fear and the death of fear is certain.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Sometimes it's better to bend than to break, but courage is knowing when to do each.
author: Unknown

quote: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
author: Rumi

quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
author: Aristotle

quote: What you are afraid to do is a clear indicator of the next thing you need to do.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Vulnerability is not winning or losing; it's having the courage to show up and be seen.
author: Brené Brown

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: The opposite of courage is not cowardice; it is conformity.
author: Rollo May

quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: No one escapes pain, fear, and suffering. Yet from pain can come wisdom, from fear can come courage.
author: Lisa Bevere

quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Bravery is the solution to regret.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Courage is being the only one who knows you’re afraid.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: You were given this life because you are strong enough to live it.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Only in the darkness can you see the stars.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: you haven’t.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Fear cuts deeper than swords.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Be bold and mighty forces will come to your aid.
author: Basil King

quote: The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: The greatest act of courage is to be and to own all of who you are—without apology.
author: Unknown

quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.
author: John A. Shedd

quote: Courage is daring to be who you are without apology.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.
author: John Irving

quote: Don’t wait for fear to go away. Take the step anyway.
author: Unknown

quote: No matter how long you have traveled in the wrong direction, you can always turn around.
author: Unknown

quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively.
author: Alan Alda

quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Be strong enough to let go and wise enough to wait for what you deserve.
author: Unknown

quote: Courage is the complement of fear. A man who is fearless cannot be courageous. He is also a fool.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: Bravery is not the absence of fear but the action in the face of fear.
author: Mark Messier

quote: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: André Gide
